import React, { useState, useEffect } from "react"; import "./ContentQuestion.css"; import Footer from "../../../layouts/frontend/Footer"; import axios from "axios"; function ContentQuestion(props) { const [question, setQuestion] = useState([]); const question_slug = props.match.params.question_slug; useEffect(() => { axios.get(`/api/question/${question_slug}`).then((res) => { if (res.data.status === 200) { setQuestion(res.data.data); console.log(res.data.data); } }); }, []); var showQuestionList = ""; showQuestionList = question.map((item) => { return (
